channel.description:
[CENTER][SIZE=3]Links[/SIZE] [SIZE=2]Forums - [url=http://www.runerv.smfnew.com/index.php]Rune Revolution[/url][/SIZE] [SIZE=2]Webclient - [url=http://runefall.webs.com/index.html]YOUR CLIENT[/url][/SIZE] [SIZE=2]Download - [url=http://uppit.com/v0rpe5befup4/client.jar]Download client.jar @ UppIT[/url][/SIZE]
[SIZE=3]First Off This is my first so please no Raging Comments Will be Reported if so...[/SIZE]
Tons of Shop Easy Money Making Methods Dungeoneering Summoning and Pouch Creation Summoning Spec Drains 70% of summoning specs work Overloads RuneScape Music system works even when you switch citys! Most 634 Items have been added Hit effects such as Divine reducing Damage Rewards for fight pits enhance exp Great Training Tons of Monsters to Fight! Tons of Bosses Gwd, Bork, Bare Bone, Nomad 14+ Bosses Tons of Mini-Games Such as Castle Wars 90% With shop, Pest Control, Duel Area, Tons more! Clipped npcs and players BoB summoning Duel arena Great Switching Very Stable! Online 24/7 Much Much more on the server Come Check it out for yourself!
[SIZE=3]PICTURES[/SIZE] [url=http://www.upload.ee/image/2950607/cw.bmp][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/2950607/cw.bmp[/img][/url] [url=http://www.upload.ee/image/2950615/cw_fighting.bmp][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/2950615/cw_fighting.bmp[/img][/url] [url=http://www.upload.ee/image/2950618/cw_fighting3.bmp][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/2950618/cw_fighting3.bmp[/img][/url] [url=http://www.upload.ee/image/2950622/Pouch_creation.bmp][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/2950622/Pouch_creation.bmp[/img][/url] [url=http://www.upload.ee/image/2950625/scroll_creation.bmp][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/2950625/scroll_creation.bmp[/img][/url] [url=http://www.upload.ee/image/2950630/untitled.bmp][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/2950630/untitled.bmp[/img][/url] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/21cz1w3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2a851n5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/qrgo4z.jpg[/img][/CENTER]
